content: DX 462 HM Metal stamping tool Fully automatic, high-productivity, powder-actuated tool for marking on cold and hot metal surfaces ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Total mobility and complete independence from electrical power supplies Marking head can accommodate up to 10 characters (depending on character type) in any combination of letters and numbers X-PT pole tool accessory allows the operator to mark red-hot material from a safer distance Increased reliability with simple cleaning and servicing A simple but secure locking mechanism ensures that the letters or numbers can be changed quickly and easily Applications Marking on hot metal surfaces with a temperature up to 800Â°C Marking on metal components for identification, traceability and quality control in steelworks, manufacturing plants, testing institutes, etc. Marking on slabs, blooms, billets and ingots as well as light-, medium- or heavy-duty steel sections Marking on metals with sharp, low-stress and mini-stress character types in different sizes ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimensions (LxWxH): 21.5 x 2.2 x 6.5 in Weight: 9.6 lb.
